mapper.update: update t_location set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_Path = #{userPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_lng = #{locationLng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, location_lat = #{locationLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, location_city = #{locationCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_Path, location_lng, location_lat, location_city from t_location
